name: Avicenna
what_did:
Avicenna wrote many books on medicine, science, and philosophy.
His book 'The Canon of Medicine' was used by doctors for hundreds of years.
He believed that knowledge could heal both the body and the mind.
why_matters:
Avicenna helped medicine become a science.
He mixed old and new ideas to help people stay healthy.
His thinking influenced both the Islamic world and Europe.

questions.q: What famous book did he write?

fun_fact: Avicenna could recite the entire Quran by age 10 and became a doctor at just 16!
